text: The Explosives Act 1957 (), is a Malaysian laws which enacted relating to the manufacture, use, sale, storage, transport, import and export of explosives. ==Structure== The Explosives Act 1957, in its current form (1 January 2006), consists of 3 Parts containing 28 sections and 1 schedule (including 5 amendments). * Part I: Preliminary * Part II: Offences, Penalties, Enforcement and Proceedings * Part III: General * Schedule ==References== ==External links== * Explosives Act 1957 Category:1957 in Malayan law Category:Malaysian federal legislation
title: Explosives Act 1957
